bridge-type.label: Lutron IP Access Point
bridge-type.description: Lutron controller using Lutron Integration Protocol (LIP) over TCP/IP

parameter.name: ipAddress
parameter.label: IP or Host Name
parameter.description: The IP or host name of the Lutron integration access point

parameter.name: user
parameter.label: User Name
parameter.description: The user name to log in to the integration access point

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: The user password to log in to the integration access point

parameter.name: reconnect
parameter.label: Reconnect Interval
parameter.description: The period in minutes that the handler will wait between connection attempts

parameter.name: heartbeat
parameter.label: Keepalive Heartbeat Interval
parameter.description: The period in minutes between connection heartbeat checks

parameter.name: delay
parameter.label: Send Delay
parameter.description: The delay in milliseconds between sending integration commands (for throttling)

parameter.name: discoveryFile
parameter.label: Discovery Data File
parameter.description: File to read device discovery information from (for debugging)

bridge-type.label: Lutron LEAP Access Point
bridge-type.description: Lutron controller using LEAP protocol over TCP/IP

parameter.name: ipAddress
parameter.label: IP or Host Name
parameter.description: The IP or host name of the Lutron integration access point

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: TCP Port
parameter.description: The bridge TCP port

parameter.name: keystore
parameter.label: Keystore File
parameter.description: Java keystore containing caseta key and certs

parameter.name: keystorePassword
parameter.label: Keystore Password
parameter.description: Password for the keystore file

parameter.name: certValidate
parameter.label: Validate SSL Certificates
parameter.description: Validate server SSL certificate

parameter.name: reconnect
parameter.label: Reconnect Interval
parameter.description: The period in minutes that the handler will wait between connection attempts

parameter.name: heartbeat
parameter.label: Keepalive Heartbeat Interval
parameter.description: The period in minutes between connection heartbeat checks

parameter.name: delay
parameter.label: Send Delay
parameter.description: The delay in milliseconds between sending integration commands (for throttling)

parameter.name: integrationId
parameter.label: Integration ID
parameter.description: Address of dimmer in the Lutron lighting system

parameter.name: fadeInTime
parameter.label: Fade In Time
parameter.description: Fade time in seconds when turning on the light

parameter.name: fadeOutTime
parameter.label: Fade Out Time
parameter.description: Fade time in seconds when turning off the light

parameter.name: onLevel
parameter.label: On Level
parameter.description: Output level to go to when an ON command is received. Default is 100%.

parameter.name: onToLast
parameter.label: Turn On To Last Level
parameter.description: If set to true, dimmer will go to the last non-zero level set when an ON command is received. If the last level cannot be determined, the value of onLevel will be used instead.

parameter.name: integrationId
parameter.label: Integration ID
parameter.description: Address of fan controller in the Lutron system

bridge-type.label: Lutron GRX-PRG or GRX-CI-PRG Bridge
bridge-type.description: Ethernet access point to Lutron GRAFIK Eye 3x/4x Systems

channel.label: All Zone Lower Stop
channel.description: Stopping all ramping down on all Control Units

channel.label: All Zone Raise Stop
channel.description: Stopping all ramping up on all Control Units

channel.label: Super Schedule Next Step
channel.description: The next step number in the Super Schedule

channel.label: Super Schedule Next Minute
channel.description: Minutes until the next step in the super schedule

channel.label: Super Schedule Next Seconds
channel.description: Seconds until the next step in the super schedule

parameter.name: ipAddress
parameter.label: IP or Host Name
parameter.description: The IP or host name of the PRG access point

parameter.name: userName
parameter.label: User Name
parameter.description: The user name to log in to the PRG access point (typically "nwk" for connection 1 or "nwk2" for connection 2)

parameter.name: retryPolling
parameter.label: Polling Interval to Try to Reconnect
parameter.description: Interval (in seconds) to try to (re)connect to the matrix

channel.label: Ramps Zone 1 Down
channel.description: Starts the ramping of Zone 1 down (in zonefade seconds)

channel.description: Starts the ramping of Zone 2 down (in zonefade seconds)

parameter.name: controlUnit
parameter.label: Integration ID
parameter.description: Address of dimmer in the Lutron lighting system

parameter.name: fade
parameter.label: Default Zone Intensity Fade Time
parameter.description: Default fade time (in seconds) to new intensity

parameter.name: shadeZones
parameter.label: Shade Zone(s)
parameter.description: Comma delimited list of zones that are QED shades

parameter.name: polling
parameter.label: Polling Interval
parameter.description: Interval (in seconds) to poll the actual state of the Matrix

parameter.name: shadeZones
parameter.label: Shade Zones
parameter.description: Comma separated list of zones that are shades

bridge-type.label: Lutron HomeWorks RS232 Bridge
bridge-type.description: RS232 access point to Legacy Lutron HomeWorks lighting control system

parameter.name: serialPort
parameter.label: HomeWorks Bridge Serial Port
parameter.description: The serial port name for the HomeWorks processor. Valid values are e.g. COM1 for Windows and /dev/ttyS0 or /dev/ttyUSB0 for Linux.

parameter.name: baudRate
parameter.label: Baud Rate
parameter.description: The baud rate to use for the RS232 connection. Valid values are 300, 600, 1200, 2400, 4800, 9600 (default), 19200, 38400, 57600, and 115200.

parameter.name: updateTime
parameter.label: Update Processor Time
parameter.description: The older HomeWorks processors seem to have difficulty keeping track of the time, especially where daylight savings is concerned. If this option is selected, the HomeWorks bridge will automatically update the processor on initialization and once per day thereafter.

thing-type.label: Lutron Dimmer (Legacy HomeWorks)
thing-type.description: Controls dimmable loads for legacy HomeWorks systems

parameter.name: address
parameter.label: Address
parameter.description: Address of dimmer in the Lutron lighting system

parameter.name: fadeTime
parameter.label: Fade Time
parameter.description: Fade time in seconds to set the light level

parameter.name: defaultLevel
parameter.label: Default Level
parameter.description: The default dimmer level to use when turning the light on

bridge-type.label: Lutron RadioRA RS232
bridge-type.description: RS-232 access to legacy Lutron RadioRA systems

parameter.name: portName
parameter.label: Serial Port
parameter.description: The serial port to use to communicate with a Lutron RadioRA system

parameter.name: baud
parameter.label: Baud Rate
parameter.description: Baud Rate (defaults to 9600)

thing-type.label: Lutron Dimmer (Legacy RadioRA)
thing-type.description: Controls dimmable loads for legacy RadioRA systems

parameter.name: zoneNumber
parameter.label: Zone Number
parameter.description: Assigned Zone Number within the Lutron RadioRA system.

parameter.name: system
parameter.label: System Number
parameter.description: System number (bridged systems only). Set to 1 or 2. 0 = NA (default).

parameter.name: fadeOutSec
parameter.label: Fade Out (sec)
parameter.description: Time in seconds dimmer should take when lowering the level

parameter.name: fadeInSec
parameter.label: Fade In (sec)
parameter.description: Time in seconds dimmer should take when increasing the level

thing-type.label: Lutron Switch (Legacy RadioRA)
thing-type.description: On/off switch for Legacy RadioRA systems

parameter.name: zoneNumber
parameter.label: Zone Number
parameter.description: Assigned Zone Number within the Lutron RadioRA system.

parameter.name: system
parameter.label: System Number
parameter.description: System number (bridged systems only). Set to 1 or 2. 0 = NA (default).

thing-type.label: Phantom Button (Legacy RadioRA)
thing-type.description: Phantom Button for Legacy RadioRA systems

parameter.name: buttonNumber
parameter.label: Phantom Button Number
parameter.description: Phantom Button Number within the Lutron RadioRA system.

parameter.name: system
parameter.label: System Number
parameter.description: System number (bridged systems only). Set to 1 or 2. 0 = NA (default).

channel-type.label: Keypad Button
channel-type.description: Button to trigger a scene or rule

channel-type.label: Keypad Button
channel-type.description: Button to trigger a scene or rule

channel-type.label: Keypad Button LED Indicator
channel-type.description: LED indicator for the associated button

channel-type.label: Keypad Button LED Indicator
channel-type.description: LED indicator for the associated button

channel-type.label: Schedule Number
channel-type.description: The schedule set on the PRG (0=suspend, 1=weekday, 2=weekend)

channel-type.label: Zone Fade (in Seconds)
channel-type.description: Specifies the fade (in seconds [truncated to nearest minute if more than 60 seconds]) when applying intensity changes

channel-type.label: Zone Intensity
channel-type.description: Specifies the intensity of the zone

channel-type.label: Zone Shade
channel-type.description: Specifies the QED shade for the zone
